00033 #include "TraCIConstants.h"
00034 #include <microsim/output/MSDetectorControl.h>
00035 #include <microsim/output/MSInductLoop.h>

00043 // ===========================================================================
00044 // used namespaces
00045 // ===========================================================================
00046 using namespace traci;
00047 
00048 
00049 // ===========================================================================
00050 // method definitions
00051 // ===========================================================================
00052 bool
00053 TraCIServerAPI_InductionLoop::processGet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00054         tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00055     std::string warning = ""; // additional description for response
00056     // variable & id
00057     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00058     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00059     // check variable
00060     if (variable != ID_LIST && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_NUMBER && variable != LAST_STEP_MEAN_SPEED
00061             && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_ID_LIST && variable != LAST_STEP_OCCUPANCY
00062             && variable != LAST_STEP_LENGTH && variable != LAST_STEP_TIME_SINCE_DETECTION
00063             && variable != LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_DATA && variable != ID_COUNT
00064             && variable != VAR_POSITION && variable != VAR_LANE_ID) {
00065         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_INDUCTIONLOOP_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Get Induction Loop Variable: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00066         return false;
00067     }
00068     // begin response building
00069     tcpip::Storage tempMsg;
00070     //  response-code, variableID, objectID
00071     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(RESPONSE_GET_INDUCTIONLOOP_VARIABLE);
00072     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(variable);
00073     tempMsg.writeString(id);
00074     // process request
00075     if (variable == ID_LIST) {
00076         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00077         MSNet::getInstance()->getDetectorControl().getTypedDetectors(SUMO_TAG_INDUCTION_LOOP).insertIDs(ids);
00078         tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00079         tempMsg.writeStringList(ids);
00080     } else if (variable == ID_COUNT) {
00081         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00082         MSNet::getInstance()->getDetectorControl().getTypedDetectors(SUMO_TAG_INDUCTION_LOOP).insertIDs(ids);
00083         tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00084         tempMsg.writeInt((int) ids.size());
00085     } else {
00086         MSInductLoop* il = static_cast<MSInductLoop*>(MSNet::getInstance()->getDetectorControl().getTypedDetectors(SUMO_TAG_INDUCTION_LOOP).get(id));
00087         if (il == 0) {
00088             server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_INDUCTIONLOOP_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Induction loop '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00089             return false;
00090         }
00091         switch (variable) {
00092             case ID_LIST:
00093                 break;
00094             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_NUMBER:
00095                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00096                 tempMsg.writeInt((int)(il->getCurrentPassedNumber()));
00097                 break;
00098             case LAST_STEP_MEAN_SPEED:
00099                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00100                 tempMsg.writeDouble(il->getCurrentSpeed());
00101                 break;
00102             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_ID_LIST: {
00103                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00104                 std::vector<std::string> ids = il->getCurrentVehicleIDs();
00105                 tempMsg.writeStringList(ids);
00106             }
00107             break;
00108             case LAST_STEP_OCCUPANCY:
00109                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00110                 tempMsg.writeDouble(il->getCurrentOccupancy());
00111                 break;
00112             case LAST_STEP_LENGTH:
00113                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00114                 tempMsg.writeDouble(il->getCurrentLength());
00115                 break;
00116             case LAST_STEP_TIME_SINCE_DETECTION:
00117                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00118                 tempMsg.writeDouble(il->getTimestepsSinceLastDetection());
00119                 break;
00120             case LAST_STEP_VEHICLE_DATA: {
00121                 std::vector<MSInductLoop::VehicleData> vd = il->collectVehiclesOnDet(MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep() - DELTA_T);
00122                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_COMPOUND);
00123                 tcpip::Storage tempContent;
00124                 unsigned int cnt = 0;
00125                 tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00126                 tempContent.writeInt((int) vd.size());
00127                 ++cnt;
00128                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vd.size(); ++i) {
00129                     MSInductLoop::VehicleData& svd = vd[i];
00130                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00131                     tempContent.writeString(svd.idM);
00132                     ++cnt;
00133                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00134                     tempContent.writeDouble(svd.lengthM);
00135                     ++cnt;
00136                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00137                     tempContent.writeDouble(svd.entryTimeM);
00138                     ++cnt;
00139                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00140                     tempContent.writeDouble(svd.leaveTimeM);
00141                     ++cnt;
00142                     tempContent.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00143                     tempContent.writeString(svd.typeIDM);
00144                     ++cnt;
00145                 }
00146 
00147                 tempMsg.writeInt((int) cnt);
00148                 tempMsg.writeStorage(tempContent);
00149                 break;
00150             }
00151             case VAR_POSITION:
00152                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_DOUBLE);
00153                 tempMsg.writeDouble(il->getPosition());
00154                 break;
00155             case VAR_LANE_ID:
00156                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRING);
00157                 tempMsg.writeString(il->getLane()->getID());
00158                 break;
00159             default:
00160                 break;
00161         }
00162     }
00163     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_INDUCTIONLOOP_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00164     server.writeResponseWithLength(outputStorage, tempMsg);
00165     return true;
00166 }
